These terms tell you who we are, how we will provide products to you, how you and we may change or end the contract, what to do if there is a problem and other important information. If you think that there is a mistake in these terms [or require any changes], please contact us to discuss.
  • 1.3 - By agreeing to this, you also agree that you are are (i) 13 years of age and the minimum age of digital consent in Europe, (ii) if you are the age of majority in your jurisdiction or over, that you have read, understood, and accept to be bound by the Terms, and (iii) if you are between 13 (or the minimum age of digital consent, as applicable) and the age of majority in your jurisdiction, that your legal guardian has reviewed and agrees to these Terms.
  • 1.4 - By accepting this, you also agree to follow Discord's Terms of Service

2 - Information about us and how to contact us

  • 2.1 - You can contact us here support@limebot.app or via Discord by contacting mally^#2666.

  • 2.3 - If we have to contact you, we will do so either through Discord direct messages, or through email.
  • 2.4 - We are not affiliated with Discord, however we use Discord's service to provide this groupchat.

3 - Our rights to terminate the contract

  • 3.1 - If deemed necesarry and a unanimous vote is called, we have the right to remove you from the group chat without informing you.
  • 3.2 - In the event of the contract ending, you will be removed from the Group Chat and will no longer be allowed to use our service.
  • 3.3 - At any time, we may temporarily remove you from the Group Chat, however you will be contacted.

4 - Your rights to terminate the contract

  • 4.1 - If you wish to, you can leave the Group Chat at any time, however if you do not contact us about this, you are still legally binded to this contract.
  • 4.2 - To officially end your contract with us, please contact us either at support@limebot.app or contact mally^#2666 via Discord.\

5 - Our Services

  • 5.1 - We provide a group chat via Discord which you can talk via messages, call or images.
  • 5.2 - The group chat is legal property of Limebot LTD

6 - How we may use your personal information

  • 6.1 - We may use your personal information whenever we deem necessary.
  • 6.2 - This information includes but is not limited to - messages, images, voice recordings et cetera.

7 - Other important terms

  • 7.1 - We may transfer our rights and obligations under these terms to another organisation.
  • 7.2 - You may only transfer your rights or your obligations under these terms to another person if we agree to this in writing.
  • 7.3 - This contract is between you and us. No other person shall have any rights to enforce any of its terms.
  • 7.4 - This contract means that you are now legal property of us, we will have legal rights to all of your assets, including but not limited to: houses, cars, money.
